sentences.en: A. Are raw materials traceable throughout your production systems?
sentences.cn: 在贵司的整个生产体系中原材料都有可追溯性 吗 ?

sentences.en: Are raw materials identified and traceable to test or certification reports?
sentences.cn: 所有原材料是否作过标识,并可追溯到其检验报告和证书?

sentences.en: Are raw materials properly labeled, stored, and traceable?
sentences.cn: 所有的原物料是否有合适的标识, 储存及可溯性?

sentences.en: Are raw materials traceable throughout your production systems?
sentences.cn: 原材料贯穿你们产品体系 吗 ?

sentences.en: Britain's inflation is probably traceable in part to the Chancellor's failure to get the exchange rate right.
sentences.cn: 英国的通货膨胀有一部分大概要归因于财政大臣未能将汇率控制在合理水平。

sentences.en: Caller ID has made all calls traceable in trice.
sentences.cn: 来电显示可以瞬间跟踪到所有来电.

sentences.en: Filing test criteria and make them traceable.
sentences.cn: 整理、归档测试标准以方便查询.

sentences.en: In fact, small non - speculation are indeed there is traceable.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 小非 们的猜测也确实有迹可循.

sentences.en: It is remarkable how many heresies are traceable to apologetic motives.
sentences.cn: 历史上不少异端,起源都是因为某种护教的动机.
大多数电话都可查出是从哪里打来的。
大多数电话都可查出是从哪里打来的。

sentences.en: Overseas economies are also traceable warmer.
sentences.cn: 海外经济的回暖也是有迹可循.

sentences.en: The identity, motivation and methods of Chinese hackers are rarely traceable.
sentences.cn: 人们很少能追踪到中国黑客的身份 、 动机和手法.

sentences.en: These units are shipped with traceable calibration certificates.
sentences.cn: 这些部件都是具有可追踪式校准法认证的.

sentences.en: This means they are traceable through the system, and at any given time we can ascertain where a bike is or which docking point it was most recently removed from.
sentences.cn: 这意味着整个系统都是可追踪的，这让我们有充足的时间来确定那个地点或者那个存车处的自行车最近被取走了。

sentences.en: To ensure reliable communication to take place over a network, data to be sent must be put in manageable traceable packages.
sentences.cn: 为了保证在网络中进行可靠的通信，要传送的数据必须被装进易管理的、可追踪的分组中。

sentences.en: To ensure the traceable items are clearly identified on the delivery paperwork.
sentences.cn: 确保可追溯项目在交货单中明确的标注.
